div.p: How can you prevent the spread of germs and viruses?
1. Stay home or keep children home if they are ill and/or have a fever over 100.4 degrees.
2. Cover coughs with your elbow, not your hand.

div.p: This is a Special Announcement Today, the Governor of New Mexico and New Mexico State Education Department announced that all public education schools will remain closed for the remainder of this academic year. The Jemez Mountain District Administration, Educational Staff and Support Services are committed in providing a Continuous Learning and Educational Plan to meet the needs of our community and the educational needs of all our children. There will be forth coming information to our parents and students early next week on plans to deliver instruction and support our students. If you have questions, please contact our district office and you will be directed to a person that will help you. Please call 575-638-5491 for all update information. Parents please remember to call this same number if you wish your child to receive a Breakfast and Lunch Sack during this extended school closure.
